title: Al2O3AnalysisApp: 'Shiny' Application for the Analysis of Al2O3:C Chips Measurements
description: A 'Shiny' application providing an exhanced graphical user interface to the function analyse_Al2O3C_Measurement() from the R package 'Luminescence'
notes: This work received a state financial support managed by the Agence Nationale de la Recherche (France) throught the program Investissements d'avenir (ref. 10-LABX-0052).
